alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 03 at 11:32PM PDT until June 05 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 south of Grenada, including the cities of Grenada, Gazelle and Weed. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 5 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
